title: How to Sync Google Contacts With Android

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Accounts.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Accounts . It's in the "Personal" section of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Google.
steps.content: Tap Google . [1] X Research source If you have not added your Google account to your Android device, tap + Add account , then tap Google and follow the on-screen prompts to add or create a new Google account.

steps.title: Slide Contacts to the "On" position .
steps.content: Slide Contacts to the "On" position . Your Google Contacts will now sync with the contacts or address book app on your Android device.
